body_html:
Also, for work with Laplacians and sparse stochastic matrices, computing row sums is useful. Currently:

D = S.sum(dim = 1)
#RuntimeError: _sum_cuda_out is not implemented for type torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor
body_text:
Also, for work with Laplacians and sparse stochastic matrices, computing row sums is useful. Currently:
D = S.sum(dim = 1)
#RuntimeError: _sum_cuda_out is not implemented for type torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor
body:
Also, for work with Laplacians and sparse stochastic matrices, computing row sums is useful. Currently:
```
D = S.sum(dim = 1)
#RuntimeError: _sum_cuda_out is not implemented for type torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor
```
